q: Additional secret documents from his years at the Pentagon will be declassified and reviewed for public release, he said. On his web site he wrote that deciding to release certain papers was difficult. These documents were not designed with an eye to history as part of an authoritative archive, he wrote. The Daily Caller reports Mike Pence ( R-IN), a possible contender for president in 2012, has announced that he will NOT run for the White House: As reported by the Indianapolis Star, Mike Pence has circulated a letter to supporters announcing the decision. `` In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana,'' wrote Mike Pence .`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.''
